node.title: Meet the passengers: Tears, hugs and 'early Christmas presents' at Hobart Airport
node.alt: A daughter holds her hands to her mother's head as she smiles and closes her eyes.
node.description: Hobart Airport's arrival hall is awash with tears and lit with smiles as Tasmania's borderÂ reopens fully to vaccinated travellers just a week and a half out from Christmas.
node.content:
["There have been emotional scenes at Hobart Airport as Tasmania's border\u00a0opens and families and friends reunite.", "For many, the timing was an early Christmas present as tough border restrictions lifted after almost two years of on-again, off-again border closures because of COVID-19.", "Meet some of those on the first flight, which touched down around 7:30am.\u00a0", "", "
Sarah says having her daughter back is \"an early Christmas present\".(ABC News: Maren Preuss)
", "\"It's been a long two years\", says Sarah as she embraces her daughter outside Hobart Airport.", "\"It's a very early Christmas present.", "\"It's very special. Very, very special.\"", "", "
Lauren Edwards rushes to greet her father, police officer Paul Edwards.(ABC News: Luke Bowden)
", "", "
Paul Edwards greets his granddaughter Isla.(ABC News: Luke Bowden)
", "", "
Gui Kafer embraces his partner Christine\u00a0Mow, who has been in Victoria and unable to enter Tasmania.(ABC News: Luke Bowden)
", "Munro says he is \"nervous\" while\u00a0waiting at the arrivals terminal,\u00a0panicky even, he says.", "It's the first time he's meeting his \"pandemic girlfriend\" he first saw during one of the video catch-ups over beer he had with his friends.\u00a0", "Eliza, now girlfriend, happened to be on the call, too.", "", "
Munro meets his girlfriend Eliza. They haven't seen each other since they first got together during the pandemic.(ABC News: Maren Preuss)
", "\"We just got along immensely right away. It was brilliant. Shared so many of the same interests,\" Munro says.", "\"Long distance wasn't really in my zone, but it happened anyway.\"", "Eliza lives in Melbourne, and he's from Tasmania.", "For months, they've been trying to fly over.", "\"Every time we tried to book something, it just got pushed further and further back. It's been a long time coming,\" Munro says.", "", "
Anna (right) meets and her son's partner for the first time.(ABC News: Maren Preuss)
", "In another first, Ovini is meeting her partner's mother in person.", "As soon as the border announcement was made, the couple booked the first flight over from Melbourne \u2014\u00a0just in time for Ovini's partner's birthday.", "\"It's very exciting, first time in Tassie,\" she says as she\u00a0embraces her partner's mother, Anna.", "Asked what she's most looking forward to doing, Anna jumps in:\u00a0\"Spending time with me.\"", "", "
Anna meets\u00a0her son who she has not seen for almost a year.(ABC News: Maren Preuss)
", "\"I've spoken to [Ovini]\u00a0but today is the first time we're meeting physically,\" says Anna.", "Anna thinks the time is right for Tasmania to reopen its border.", "\"I don't mind. I know people have to be double vaxxed and they've had to do a test before coming on, so I think if everybody does that we'll be fine,\" she says.", "\"It's inevitable that we'll get a case or something, and we'll have to deal with it when we do.\"", "", "
Returned traveller Lauren arrived in Tasmania\u00a0from Berlin and had to go into home quarantine so could not hug her mother who she hasn't seen for two and a half years.\u00a0(ABC News: Maren Preuss\u00a0)
", "", "
Colin says he always brings flowers when he meets his wife at the airport.(ABC News: Luke Bowden)
", "", "
Why we hear about some COVID-19 variants more than others
"]
